theStoneGiant:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theStoneGiant:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theStoneGiant:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theStoneGiant:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theStoneGiant:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theStoneGiant:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theStoneGiant:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theStoneGiant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theStoneGiant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theStoneGiant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theStoneGiant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theStoneGiant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theStoneGiant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
